subject: Appologies to the group
author: bhali333
full_text:
I would like to appologise for voicing my negative opinion about chris 
moon on this group. I seldom lose my temper but enough is enough with 
this guy.

My appology is for bringing negative energy to the group, especially 
when I have been preaching harmony and posotivity. I guess that's what 
makes us human.

Sorry all lets try to keep our negativity in check.

Bruce
